markdown:
| icon              = poe2 battle_axe_obsidian_icon.png
| description       = Seemingly no more than a wedge of finely-knapped obsidian, the blade of this axe cuts through cadaverous flesh like a ship through water. Stories of this weapon source it back to the aftermath of a volcanic devastation that scoured a Huana village off the map. The hardy souls of Mataru warriors and priests lost in the lava flow may have imbued the rock with some unusual properties.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Weapon
| weapon_type       = Battle axe
| requirements      =

| is_unique         = yes
